subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}
{{Han compound|禾|乃|ls=p|t1=plant}}, resembling a fruit/an ear hanging off a plant.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
May be a causative of {{och-l|褎|id=2|growth of seedlings}}. Compare {{cog|mkh-vie-pro|*m-loh||to blossom}} (whence {{cog|vi|trổ||to burst, to open, to display}}, {{m|vi|lổ||naked}}), and {{cog|km|លាស់||to grow, to blossom, to prosper}}.

The meaning of “show” [noun] is a {{psm|zh|en|show|nocap=1}}.
